title: Melbourne Day 2 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Yesterday was a relaxed day, with Yersika we decided just to visit some spots in the city without any particular program. We just roam in the city.

Our fist sport was the St Patrickâ€™s Cathedral.

Because was close we also visited the Parliament of Victoria.

Melbourne is famous for his tram systems and a good think in this system is that inside the CBD the trams are free.

Also, there is a free City Circle Tram that surround the district. After took this tram we stop in couple park just to walk and take some pictures. We enjoy the Flagstaff Gardens.

At the end of the day, we had a dinner with some classmates of Yersika in a Korean restaurant.
